column4: hey, just a curious thing - is there any way to open a new tab and cd to a location but from the command line? Using lxterminal. I know about ^t and how to do from the gui of that terminal but I wonder if there is a command I can issue that will open a new tab.
you have ctrl+altF1-F6 as ttys  is that what you mean?
if you want tabs in a tty or split screen I would install screen and use that.
not exactly. what I was wondering is if there is a command I can type on the comand line that will open a new tab
